com.petroldesigns.chatbot.conversation
Class Synonyms

java.lang.Object
  com.petroldesigns.chatbot.conversation.Synonyms

public class Synonyms
extends java.lang.Object

Synonyms stores a collection of configuration specified synonymous words and phrases that can be used within a conversation

Author:
atrank

load

public void load(java.lang.String file)
load the specified key=value1,value2,...,valueN file containing the list of synonyms.

Parameters:
file - the path to the file containing the synonyms definition.

isYesOrNo

public boolean isYesOrNo(java.lang.String wrd)
Convenience method to check if a word is either synonymous with "yes" or "no"

Parameters:
wrd - the word to be checked
Returns:
true if the word is either synonymous with "yes" or "no", returns false otherwise.

isYes

public boolean isYes(java.lang.String wrd)
check if the specified word matches the semantic meaning of "yes"

Parameters:
wrd - The word to be checked
Returns:
True if the word means "yes", false otherwise

isNo

public boolean isNo(java.lang.String wrd)
check if the specified word matches the semantic meaning of "no"

Parameters:
wrd - The word to be checked
Returns:
True if the word means "no", false otherwise

meaningMatch

public boolean meaningMatch(java.lang.String word1,
                            java.lang.String word2)
Checks if the two specified words have the same semantic meaning as defined in by the synonyms datastore.

Parameters:
word1 - The first word to be checked (must be lowercase)
word2 - The second word to be checked (must be lowercase)
Returns:
true if the word meanings match, false otherwise

getSemanticRoot

public java.lang.String getSemanticRoot(java.lang.String in)
Gets the Semantic Root of the word specified

Parameters:
in - The input word to check for a "Semantic Root" (must be lowercase)
Returns:
The Base word if it exists, or "" otherwise

containsKeyword

public boolean containsKeyword(java.lang.String word)
Checks if the specified word is defined as a keyword value in the sybStore datastore.

Parameters:
word - The word to check for.
Returns:
True if the word is a keyword, false otherwise
